data.title: Back In Time
data.text: Beautiful antiques, glass, candlesticks, and furniture. You can close your eyes and picture the ladies and gentlemen dancing underneath the giant chandelier.

data.title: history plus antiques
data.text: Maggys Antiques is in an old historic church.  When you walk in the door the first thing you notice is the huge pink stained glass window in the back.  You will mostly find primitives here but they do offer accessories, collectibles and furniture.  Look for the mural on the side of a building welcoming you to the antique district, park your car by the mural, and enjoy the 5 different antique stores on Castle Street.  Be sure to say hello to their doggy Butterbean.
